title: Essence Of The Heart
description: Jacob Richins is the young captain of the guard. Trained well by his father, who was captain before him, he is proficient at his work. It is unknown why assassination attempts against the royal family are increasing, so when Jacob is called before the queen, he is sure it is to discuss the security situation.Instead the queen assigns him to tutor her seventeen year old daughter to prepare her for her royal ball. Angry at what he feels is a degrading assignment he trains the princess much as he would one of his men, feeling if the queen chooses to remove him all the better.But as he begins to understand the princess he begins to see much deeper than her rough exterior. When another assassination attempt occurs and it is realized she is the object of the attacks he fears for her safety. The reason for the attacks must be found out and an end put to them if the princess is to be saved.
author: Daris Howard
